author: Jon Fingas
title: Ubisoft offers free games to encourage you to stay at home
description: Ubisoft thinks it has a simple way to encourage people to stay at home and wait out the COVID-19 pandemic: shower them with games.  It's running a month-long campaign that will give away free games, trials, discounts and other offers to give you something to …
content:
Future offers will be available through Ubisoft's Free Events site.
There's no doubt that Ubi is using this partly as a promotional tool for its catalog. You might try a game you skipped the first time around, or might feel compelled to subscribe to Uplay+ t… [+197 chars]
